mapper.insert: INSERT INTO tb_question_grading_his( deploy_seq, user_seq, submit_dt, exec_time, score_rate, grading_order ) VALUES ( CAST(#{deploySeq} as integer), CAST(#{userSeq} as integer), #{submitDt}, CAST(#{executeTime} as integer), CAST(#{socoreRate} as integer), CAST(#{gradingOrder} as integer) )
